description: The Paonia Desert Boot is ready to be worn every day of the week. All the comfort and fit of your favorite Zs, now in a handsome and versatile chukka-style boot. An upper built from waterproof, waxy suede leather keeps the elements out, while our Gold-Rated sourcing keeps the environmental standard that defines our commitment to sustainability. Dress up or dress down, whatever the occasion, the Paonia Desert Boot has you covered.
name: Chaco Paonia Desert Boot - Mens
